description: Formal Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and County Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (England and Wales) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of a mixed-use development comprising of a scheme for up to 560 residential units (48,100 square metres) (GEA) and associated car parking, cycle parking and health and wellbeing centre and crèche (Use Class D1) (1,600 square metres (GEA) (the ‘S1 and S 11 Scheme’); and a scheme for a commercial office building (Class B1) (circa 44,845 square metres) (GEA) with retail (Class A1,A2, A3, A4, A5) (circa 980 sq.m GEA) and Alternative uses (including D2 uses) (circa 1,175 sq.m) (‘the S10 Scheme’). The development will provide tall buildings with full details submitted for the S1 and S11 scheme and outline details for the S10 scheme. Both schemes will deliver public realm, landscaping and infrastructure.
